p: Finally, if y t is number of infected individuals referred to a specific day, and Eq. (1) is calculated for each day changing dependent variable by using data of infected individuals at day t = 1, day t = 2, day t = 3, …, day t = n, the variation of coefficients of regression b i ( i = 1, .., n) , during quarantine and lockdown in Italy, can be used to assess with a good approximation the possible end of epidemic wave as follows:
